title: Retry build and redeploy after intermittent deployment failure

requirements.text: Retry the application build and deployment without introducing any code changes, since the user explicitly requested a rebuild after an intermittent deployment failure.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build/deploy attempt is triggered for the current project revision (no source changes).
If the deployment fails again, the build output/error logs are captured and surfaced so the next request can target a specific fix.

constraints: Do not modify any frontend or backend code as part of this request; this is a rebuild/redeploy retry only.
nonGoals: Do not implement the pending UI/ID fixes described in project_state.json as part of this request.
Do not refactor or change application behavior.
